title: Chris Froome
summary: Christopher Clive Froome, OBE (born 20 May 1985) is a British road racing cyclist who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Israel Start-Up Nation.[7][8] He has won seven Grand Tours: four editions of the Tour de France (in 2013, 2015, 2016 and 2017), one Giro d'Italia (2018) and the Vuelta a Espa√±a twice (2011[N 2] and 2017). He has also won several other stage races, and the Velo d'Or three times.
